thread.title: Mississippi monument to be placed at Tennessee military park
thread.title_full: Mississippi monument to be placed at Tennessee military park - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Mississippi monument to be placed at Tennessee military park
text:
TUPELO, Miss. (AP) - A dedication ceremony will take place Saturday for the placement of a Mississippi Monument at Shiloh National Military Park in Tennessee.
WTVA-TV reports ( http://bit.ly/1jU1kTg ) the monument will be unveiled at 11 a.m.
The marker is the result of years of work by several public and private groups to get a marker to remember those from the Magnolia State who fought in the Civil War battle at Shiloh and Corinth.
Dr. J. Kim Sessums is the sculptor of the marker.
Sessums, a gynecologist in Brookhaven, also worked on the African-American Monument in the Vicksburg National Military Park.
Mississippi will be the 16th state to place a monument at the Shiloh battlefield site.
Information from: WTVA-TV, http://www.wtva.com
